mapper.select:
select coupon_no as couponNo, coupon_name as couponName, coupon_type as couponType, discount from coupon where coupon_no in (select coupon_no as couponNo from member_coupon where coupon_no in (select coupon_no from coupon where main_target in ('all','fund') and
sub_target in ('all','food')
sub_target in ('all','beauty')
sub_target in ('all','pet')
sub_target in ('all','travel')
sub_target in ('all','living')
and #{rewardSum} > min_price) and member_no=#{memberNo} and coupon_use=0 and coupon_status=0 and
coupon_type in(1,2)
coupon_type in(0,1,2)
)
mapper.insert: insert into fund_pay values( fpay_seq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{fundNo}, #{fpayDeliveryfee}, #{fpaySupport}, #{fpayRewardTotal}, #{fpayFunding}, #{fpayFinalpay}, 0, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{nameShow}, #{fundingShow}, #{payMethod}, #{couponNo} )
mapper.update: update member_coupon set coupon_use=1, use_date=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where member_no=#{memberNo} and coupon_no=#{couponNo}
mapper.select: select fpay_no as fpayNo, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, fund_no as fundNo, fpay_deliveryfee as fpayDeliveryfee, fpay_support as fpaySupport, fpay_reward_total as fpayRewardTotal, fpay_funding as fpayFunding, fpay_finalpay as fpayFinalpay, fpay_status as fpayStatus, fpay_date as fpayDate, name_show as nameShow, funding_show as fundingShow, pay_method as payMethod from fund_pay where fund_no=#{fundNo} and member_id=#{memberId} and fpay_finalpay=#{fpayFinalpay}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, p.* from (select fpay_no as fpayNo, member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, fund_no as fundNo, fpay_deliveryfee as fpayDeliveryfee, fpay_support as fpaySupport, fpay_reward_total as fpayRewardTotal, fpay_funding as fpayFunding, fpay_finalpay as fpayFinalpay, fpay_status as fpayStatus, fpay_date as fpayDate, name_show as nameShow, funding_show as fundingShow, pay_method as payMethod from fund_pay where fund_no=#{fundNo} order by fpay_no desc)p)
